00036 #import "RCImageCoder.h"
00037 
00038 @implementation RCImageCoder
00039 
00040 + (void) load {
00041         NSRegularExpression *mimeExpression = [NSRegularExpression regularExpressionWithPattern:@"image" options:0 error:NULL];
00042 #if TARGET_OS_IPHONE
00043         [RCCoder registerCoder:self objectType:[UIImage class] mimeTypes:[NSArray arrayWithObject:mimeExpression]];
00044 #else
00045         [RCCoder registerCoder:self objectType:[NSImage class] mimeTypes:[NSArray arrayWithObject:mimeExpression]];
00046 #endif
00047 }
00048 
00049 - (NSData *) encodeObject:(id)object {
00050 #if TARGET_OS_IPHONE
00051         if ([object isKindOfClass:[UIImage class]]) {
00052                 return UIImagePNGRepresentation(object);
00053         }
00054 #else
00055         //TODO: handle NSImage
00056 #endif
00057         return nil;
00058 }
00059 
00060 - (id) decodeData:(NSData *)data {
00061 #if TARGET_OS_IPHONE
00062         return [[UIImage alloc] initWithData:data];
00063 #else
00064         //TODO: handle NSImage
00065 #endif
00066         return data;
00067 }
00068 
00069 @end
